name: WaveStone
description:
Welcome to the Jungle Bobhus the Great! You are the only only one that survived the slaughter of your tibe. You have only one job! To protect the only one sacred fire! With your only one spear'o'hammer of justice!
But be careful, the hostile tribe is tracking you... Will you survive the night?

The main goal is to defeat the approaching waves. The only type of weapon you can use is your spear'o'hammer and you can use it only once.
If you want to use your attack again you need to pick up your master weapon
Enjoy!

SPACE - Interact/Pick up
WASD or Arrows - Movement
Aim using your mouse
Shoot the spear'o'hammer with left mouse button
